name: UI Agent
description: Agent responsible for Streamlit UI, dashboard UX, and visualization performance
responsibilities: Keep UI reactive and fast (use caching when appropriate)
Avoid business logic in views (delegate to app/core)
Ensure settings are validated and safely handled
Improve dashboards without breaking core APIs

add_view.template: Create or update Streamlit view {view_name} in app/ui. Use app/core interfaces for data. Add lightweight smoke coverage if feasible.

improve_perf.template: Profile slow dashboard interactions and apply caching/state improvements. Avoid changing core algorithm behavior unless required.
